tier.item: (4) a. Karna wapa- rna warrayi, jukudu nanda- lha.
man.ABS go- PART AUX kangaroo.ABS kill- IMPLIC.SAME
`The man went to kill a kangaroo.'

(58) a. Ngathu nganyja- yi, ngalda diyari yawada
I.ERG want- PRES we.DU.INCL.NOM Diyari language

you.DU.NOM go- IMP we.PL.INCL.NOM see- IMPLIC.SAME
